MetaTruth v1.0 Alpha.8.1

An app to help answer the most controversial questions

Welcome To MetaTruth!

This app is designed to help answer the most complex and controversial issues that our society faces

MetaTruth is a three tier system consisting of:
  1. Issues
  2. Main Points
  3. Support Points

Issues

On MetaTruth, everything is rooted back to main issues. Issues are the core question to the conversations that take place on the site.

NOTE: You will notice that on every type of post, there is the ability to vote the post up or down. Generally speaking, you should upvote an issue if you think it is quality/important to our society, and downvote irrelevant points.
